questions.quote: She was practically undressing in front of me at the theatre.
All right, I got everything here. I got the Cyclone F series, Hydra Jet Flow, Stockholm Superstream, you name it.
You shrunk it! You know you shrunk it! Just tell me that you shrunk it!
Mind? Why would I mind? I would love to wait!  Nana, nice to see you. Ni-ni-ni-ni-NANA!  Aunt Phyllis, always a pleasure. What a pleasure! Hey, let's do this again real soon. I had fun, huh?
She dragged me down to that warehouse on the waterfront in Brooklin to see one of her "performances".
Well, when I came over to the table she mentioned something about how she better hurry up and leave or you'd make her buy lunch to make up for the one you bought yesterday.
He just thinks that anything that dissolves in milk is funny.
He's all together crazy, that one! Jerry? I used to think was nice... I don't know what happened to him...
Have you seen his act? He's got a twelve-minute bit about Ovaltine. He's a punk, a patsy, a hack.
Anyway, she wants to meet me! She invited me over for dinner!
